Collier Blvd. Marco Island, FL 34145 WATERFRONT DINIING Live Entertainment Thursday Karaoke with Johnny Fusco 6-9pm Saturday Johnny Fusco 6-9pm THE SPEAKEASY OF MARCO ISLAND Located on the Water in the Chamber of Commerce Plaza. 1106 1/2 N. Collier Blvd., Marco Island, FL 34145 HAPPY HOUR GREAT FOOD GREAT ATMOSPHERE THE SPEAKEASY OF MARCO ISLAND Located on the Water in the Chamber of Commerce Plaza. 1106 1/2 N. Collier Blvd., Marco Island, FL 34145 GREAT FOOD End Main Slider Section Content About us The SpeakEasy Marco A speakeasy was an establishment which illegally sold alcoholic beverages during Prohibition, from 1920-1932. The term comes from a patron's manner of ordering an alcoholic drink without raising suspicion. Bartenders would tell patrons to be quiet and "speak easy". The SpeakEasy offers a variety of Chicago style fare. We serve Lunch and Dinner every day. The Kitchen opens daily at 11am and closes at 10pm and 9pm on Sunday. Our current Happy Hour runs from 2pm to 6pm. We offer discounted prices on house wine, beer and select liquor. (Specialty Cocktails, Premium Wines and Happy Hour prices are excluded during special events and entertainment) We offer off premise catering. We have Thursday night Karaoke with Johnny Fusco from 6-9pm. Saturday with Johnny Fusco from 6-9pm. Call for details. Shop at our NEW RETAIL STORE. SpeakEasy, but tell everyone! Our current Happy Hour runs from 2pm to 6pm. We offer discounted prices on house wine, beer and select liquor. (Specialty Cocktails, Premium Wines and Happy Hour Prices are Excluded during Special Events and Entertainment). We have Thursday night Karaoke with Johnny Fusco from 6-9pm. Saturday with Johnny Fusco from 6-9pm. Row Catering The SpeakEasy can cater any event – on location or in our waterfront restaurant. For more information or to plan your next event call Cindy at 239-970-2929. Group Parties Our waterfront location in beautiful Marco Island provides the ideal location to celebrate your next big event. Birthdays, Team Parties, Holiday Parties, Family Gatherings, and Business Luncheons. Sports We have one 75", two 60"s and ten 50"s. There are six 50"s outside on the water. The SpeakEasy Marco Island . Development by Gudgel Graphix End Footer About us The SpeakEasy Marco A speakeasy was an establishment which illegally sold alcoholic beverages during Prohibition, from 1920-1932. The term comes from a patron's manner of ordering an alcoholic drink without raising suspicion. Bartenders would tell patrons to be quiet and "speak easy". The SpeakEasy offers a variety of Chicago style fare. We serve Lunch and Dinner every day. The Kitchen opens daily at 11am and closes at 10pm and 9pm on Sunday. Our current Happy Hour runs from 2pm to 6pm. We offer discounted prices on house wine, beer and select liquor. (Specialty Cocktails, Premium Wines and Happy Hour prices are excluded during special events and entertainment) We offer off premise catering. We have Thursday night Karaoke with Johnny Fusco from 6-9pm. Saturday with Johnny Fusco from 6-9pm. Call for details. Shop at our NEW RETAIL STORE. SpeakEasy, but tell everyone! Saturday with Johnny Fusco from 6-9pm. Row Catering The SpeakEasy can cater any event – on location or in our waterfront restaurant. For more information or to plan your next event call Cindy at 239-970-2929. Group Parties Our waterfront location in beautiful Marco Island provides the ideal location to celebrate your next big event. Birthdays, Team Parties, Holiday Parties, Family Gatherings, and Business Luncheons. Sports We have one 75", two 60"s and ten 50"s. There are six 50"s outside on the water.
